name: GIANT Sushi Party!
description:
What is better than regular sushis? GIANT sushis!

As the new sushi master in town, you have one job: satisfy your customers with the most delicious ingredient mix. They might have some precise tastes!

In GIANT Sushi party, your goal is to earn money by creating the perfect sushi for your customers.

Stack up your ingredients, click on the plate and let the travelator do his office! But take care that you don’t run out of space, or your delicious plates might be… stuck in the loop!

Made by Charly Piva, Pierre Terakopiantz and Thomas Guégan for Ludum Dare 47.
